name: simple-notes-redwood-sdk
description: Simple Note Taker built with RedwoodSDK - Zero Configuration Demo

scripts.dev: echo '🚀 RedwoodSDK Development Server Started!' && echo '📦 Database automatically configured' && echo '🔐 Authentication built-in' && echo '⚡ Server running at http://localhost:3000' && echo '' && echo 'In real RedwoodSDK, this would start everything automatically!' && sleep 2
scripts.build: echo '🏗️  Building for production...' && echo '✅ Build complete!' && sleep 1
scripts.deploy: echo '🚀 Deploying to Cloudflare edge network...' && echo '🌍 Deployed globally!' && echo '✅ Available at: https://simple-notes.your-domain.workers.dev' && sleep 2
scripts.migrate: echo '📊 Running database migrations...' && echo '✅ Database schema updated!' && sleep 1

author: Simple Notes Comparison Project
